titleStmt.title: An exact account of the taking of the pass of Butlers'-Bridge, and of the demolishing of Cavan. With the particulars of defeating the Irish forces at those places. In a letter from an Officer at Belturbet, to a Person of Quality in London. Licensed March 29. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. Goodman, in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: some faded print in text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
